categoryDescription.title: Isoart Ceilings combine sophisticated design with modern EPS technology.
categoryDescription.description: Isoart Ceilings are manufactured in high-density EPS, offering multiple models with unique and sophisticated designs. Currently available in Dunes and Paris models, each with distinct aesthetic characteristics that allow complete customization of environments. They replace traditional materials such as plaster with greater lightness, moisture resistance and quick installation, providing economy, thermal comfort and high-quality finishes for interior ceilings.

applications.title: Sophisticated aesthetic finishes for ceilings in residential and commercial projects
applications.description: Isoart Ceilings are ideal for interior ceilings that require differentiated aesthetic finishes. With multiple models available, each offers unique characteristics that allow complete customization of environments. They replace traditional materials such as plaster and wood, offering lightness, moisture resistance and thermal insulation, being perfect for residences, offices and commercial spaces that seek aesthetics, functionality and differentiation.

tabDescriptions.Multiple models available: We currently offer Dunes and Paris models, each with unique aesthetic characteristics. The Dunes model is inspired by the natural undulations of sand dunes, while Paris evokes the elegance of Parisian architecture.
tabDescriptions.Aesthetics and customization: Each ceiling model has a unique and sophisticated design, allowing finishes such as paintings, textures and cornices. The differentiated patterns serve projects ranging from those seeking harmony with nature to those requiring architectural sophistication and refinement.
tabDescriptions.Efficient installation: Fixing with specific adhesives or AC-3 mortar ensures speed, practicality and cleanliness in construction, with joints reinforced by fiberglass tape.
tabDescriptions.Thermal insulation: Low thermal conductivity EPS (~0.035 W/m·K) provides thermal comfort and energy savings in air conditioning.
tabDescriptions.Sustainability: 100% recyclable and CFC-free, Isoart ceilings are environmentally responsible.
